docs.text: Usage ¶ A utility function is provided. import os.path import uvicorn from bareasgi import Application from bareasgi_static import add_static_file_provider here = os . path . abspath ( os . path . dirname ( __file__ )) app = Application () add_static_file_provider ( app , os . path . join ( here , 'simple_www' ), index_filename = 'index.html' ) uvicorn . run ( app , port = 9010 )
